title: Happy Birthday right on the button, Kristina!
content:
Kristina Drake sews on another birthday today!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905210124im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Button_3712.jpg)

ChrisL

 [‹ Random:Name of big characters at beginning of paragraphs](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905210124/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41172 "Go to previous forum topic") [Not a Mac vs. PC question ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905210124/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42225 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content: Suck back a couple of Brador on me, eh? ;-)

Awwwwww shucks! Thanks guys! Love those buttons, Dezcom!

I’ll be working on some Boreal and Scrabble later tonight once the kids are in bed and while the SO is off signing the papers for our new house! (Yay! a house for my birthday!)

:)

Kristina
Happy Birthday and a big WOOHOO for a new house!!

I hope your house settlement went smoothly and you don’t have writer’s cramps from all the signing :-)

ChrisL

Now I’m sneezing, scratching and high.

Fifteen boxes of books packed this morning. The whole rest of the house to go!

:D

Is the baby being a BIG help? :-)

ChrisL
